definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Formation mechanism and characterization of anodic aluminum oxide templates;
sentences.chinese: 硅酮密封胶对阳极氧化铝的黏结质量千差万别。

sentences.english: An improved precipitation system is provided for the Bayer process production of alumina hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 改进的降水系统提供的氧化铝水合物拜耳法生产。

sentences.english: The open cell alumina foam ceramics were prepared by impregnating a polymeric sponge with aqueous ceramic slurry.
sentences.chinese: 采用有机泡沫前驱体浸渍工艺制备氧化铝泡沫陶瓷。

sentences.english: Porous alumina was prepared by anodization in oxalic acid electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 在草酸电解液中，用阳极氧化法制备了多孔氧化铝。

sentences.english: Delays or outright refusals have been reported for imports permits for alumina (feeder stock for aluminum) .
sentences.chinese: 据报道，进口氧化铝的许可被拖延或者直接否决。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 制备了纯镍刷镀层和镍基纳米氧化铝复合刷镀层。

sentences.english: An electic current is applied to the cell, converting the aluminium surface into a coating of aluminium oxide.
sentences.chinese: 电解池通过电流，铝片的表面就逐渐积聚起氧化铝层。

sentences.english: Prepared adsorbents, copper-containing alumina, are effective in adsorbing mercaptan in kerosene.
sentences.chinese: 利用油乳法制备了含铜氧化铝吸附剂。

sentences.english: The super-fine aluminium hydroxide is widely used due to its advantages.
sentences.chinese: 超细氢氧化铝具有许多优点，应用广泛。

sentences.english: However, the alumina layers spall as the temperature increases.
sentences.chinese: 但是，氧化铝层剥落的温度升高。

sentences.english: To prevent dilution, the alumina has to be centrifuged to dryness after the washing step.
sentences.chinese: 水洗后离心并尽可能吸干氧化铝中的水分。

sentences.english: Greenish-blue pigment consisting essentially of cobalt oxide and alumina .
sentences.chinese: 绿蓝色颜料，主要含有氧化钴和氧化铝。

sentences.english: After setting, the surfaces of the specimens are ground down using carborundum and alumina.
sentences.chinese: 凝固之后，样品表面连续用金钢砂或氧化铝磨平。

sentences.english: The quality of silicone sealant adhesion to anodized aluminum varies widely.
sentences.chinese: 硅酮密封胶对阳极氧化铝的黏结质量千差万别。

sentences.english: Aluminium frame finished in anodised aluminium or powder coated white.
sentences.chinese: 铝合金框架完成了阳极氧化铝涂层或白色粉末。

sentences.english: Window frames and shutters are anodised aluminium.
sentences.chinese: 窗框和百叶窗的阳极氧化铝。

definition: sodium carbonate Na2CO3/soda ash/same as 碳酸鈉|碳酸钠
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
